\sphinxAtStartPar
Upload the given content (PDF or text data) to Nextcloud.
If content\_type is â€˜textâ€™, it will upload the content as text (encoded in utf\sphinxhyphen{}8),
otherwise it will treat it as binary content.

\end{fulllineitems}
